name: Last Stop (itch) (missingpixel, Edison Estes)
description:
KNOWN BUG: Hi peoples! We have discovered a bug where story fragments from a ghost who has just vanished cannot be removed from your inventory. Because of this, I would highly recommend removing all fragments from your inventory before giving a spirit their ticket just to be safe. This bug will be fixed as soon as the GMTK 2021 game jam judging period is over.

Enjoy!

This game was created as a submission for the GMTK 2021 game jam! The theme for the jam was "Joined Together."

HOW TO PLAY:

 - WASD or arrow keys to move. Shift while moving lets you sprint.

 - Talk to ghosts with the E key. Click the inventory button to open the inventory.

 - Read the ghost's stories, and find parts from separate ghosts' stories that seem to match.

 - In the inventory, combine dialogue boxes by dragging one on top of another. If they match, it will create a ticket. Give the ticket to the ghost to release them.

 - Release all ghosts to complete the game.

Team Members: 

  • Griffin Carlson - Designer
  • Edison Estes - Designer
  • Kyle Murray - Programmer
  • Lee Siassi - Artist
  • Alasdair Rush - Editor and Emotional Support
